jobs.title: Content Marketing Manager
jobs.content:
About X-Team
X-Team is an international company founded in Melbourne, Australia that helps companies scale their development teams by providing them with extraordinary developers from around the world.
We are 100% remote and believe in building a world where developers can have access to an environment of growth and incredible opportunities regardless of where they live. Our culture is based around the proactive, selfless values that make up every X-Teamer. You can learn more about our culture here.
This is a remote contractor role with X-Team International in Australia.

The position
We are seeking for an experienced Content Marketing Manager for the planning, coordination, execution and analysis of all owned, earned and paid content. This is an exciting position within our Growth team so you have a real opportunity to make it your own. Whilst youâll be mentored and supported, you will be expected to bring your own ideas and skills to the role.

About you
- Data-driven with the ability to collect, analyze, and report on data to inform all decisions
- Creative, proactive and highly organised with the ability to manage your own time
- Confident with excellent communication skills and the ability to build relationships
- Experienced with managing ad campaigns in Facebook/Twitter
- Experience working in an engineering/developer-centric culture
- Familiarity with a higher-level programming language, such as Ruby, Python, or JavaScript
- Ability to create high-quality, innovative content for software developers

You will...
- Manage in house and outsourced content authors
- Manage the content development standards and SEO
- Manage the content calendar and publishing across channels
- Manage the content distribution, blogger outreach and influencer marketing
- Develop different content types (blog post, eBooks, case studies..) for our audiences
- Track and report content marketing KPIs

This is an incredibly exciting time for this role as we are embarking on a new branding campaign as well. Itâs an opportunity to be part of a team that starts a movement in the development industry.

Benefits:
- Work remotely and live freely
- Weâll help you learn and grow each day
- Unleash your inner superhero

To apply: http://goo.gl/QDmI9J

jobs.title: Continuous Integration Specialist
jobs.content:
We are looking for a Continuous Integration Specialist to strengthen our developer operations capabilities to Suunto headquarters in Vantaa, Finland. If you enjoy working on developing state of art capabilities in building and integrating high tech consumer solutions, this role is what you’re looking for. Active lifestyle and interest for sports is considered as a plus.


Your main responsibility as a Continuous Integration Specialist is to develop and maintain world class software building and integration set up for our solutions.


Together with the team you innovate and create new and more efficient capabilities for building and integrating Suunto's products and solutions. Our target is to provide smoothly working, highly automated, fast and efficient CI environment.

jobs.title: Test Automation Specialist
jobs.content:
We are looking for a Test Automation Specialist to join our Software team in Suunto headquarters in Vantaa. 


This is a great opportunity for you if you are interested and enjoy designing test automation software for high tech consumer products. Active lifestyle and interest for sports is considered as a plus.

Your main responsibility as a Test Automation Lead Designer/Architect is to provide technical leadership and architectural structure to the design and development of the test automation solution with a team of a DevOps professionals. You’ll be working both with simulation environment and real hardware. Together with our team you innovate and create new test automation solutions for Suunto's products and solutions.

jobs.title: Software Delivery Manager
jobs.content:
We are looking for Software Delivery Manager to join us in either Vantaa or Tampere 

Want to join us in delivering compelling solutions to our customers? In this role, you are part of Suunto’s user centric teams that have a desire to deliver world-class solutions that inspire people to live active and adventurous life.
Your main responsibilities are to manage time based delivery of Suunto software solutions and to measure and analyse field quality as well as to turn the found issues into concrete actions. You play key role in enforcing continuous integration and delivery practices. You are the person to go to when there are questions about the end to end release process, delivery lifecycle or contents of the deliveries.

jobs.title: Senior Android Developer
jobs.content:
At Sports Tracker, we build apps used by millions of people, and we take great pride in our work.


This means excellent development practices, careful code architecture, and an organization built around rapid releases. With a strong focus on delightful user experiences, we balance building new features, refactoring code, and tweaking existing features based on analytics data. Every line of code gets reviewed by other developers, every pixel inspected by designers, and every feature hammered on by manual and automated QA. We have offices in Helsinki, Vantaa & Tampere.


We are now looking for enthusiastic and experienced Android Software Engineers who want to take their skills to the next level by joining our awesome Android team!


You will get the chance to work in a highly motivated, agile and self-organized team of engineers UX designers, QA and product managers. In your work you have the opportunity to use cutting edge technology in building new exciting features and implement dp perfect designs with advanced animations.

jobs.title: Senior Software Delivery Manager
jobs.content:
We are looking for Software Delivery Manager to join us in either Vantaa or Tampere


Want to join us in delivering compelling solutions to our customers? In this role, you are part of Suunto’s user centric teams that have a desire to deliver world-class solutions that inspire people to live active and adventurous life.
Your main responsibilities are to manage time based delivery of Suunto software solutions and to measure and analyse field quality as well as to turn the found issues into concrete actions. You play key role in enforcing continuous integration and delivery practices. You are the person to go to when there are questions about the end to end release process, delivery lifecycle or contents of the deliveries.

jobs.title: Share our Pride - Make A Difference With Leonardo
jobs.content:
We are looking for motivated and adaptable individuals to fill multiple roles across our growing software communities at Capability Green, Luton and Edinburgh. We want YOU to become part of one of our integrated teams within one of our lines of business contributing to the development of current and future state-of-the-art products such as


-  providing the primary sensors for the Typhoon fighter jet or the SAAB Gripen fighter;


-  one of our laser target designator or laser ranging systems for unmanned aircraft;


-  electronic countermeasures and integrated defensive aids system that protect our clients


-  designing and delivering new customer facing projects across land and naval sectors 


We have opportunities for Software & Senior Software and Principal Software Engineers. We also have multiple roles for Systems/Senior Systems Engineers and Systems Architects across our main sites at EDINBURGH, LUTON AND BASILDON.

jobs.title: Software Engineers - Make A Difference With Leonardo
jobs.content:
We are looking for motivated and adaptable Software Engineers to join our growing software community at Capability Green, Luton. As part of an integrated team  within the Electronic Warfare Line of Business, you will be contributing to the development of current and future products. These include radar warning receivers (RWR), electronic support measures (ESM), electronic countermeasures (ECM) and integrated defensive aids systems (IDAS). This will provide you with the opportunity to develop your skills across a wide range of products and technologies. Dependent on the experience of the candidate this is a Software or Senior Software position.


Working as part of an established software development team and supported by a team of experienced engineers you will be responsible for:



  • Specification, design, coding and testing of complex real-time embedded software.

  • Developing and applying your knowledge of software engineering to undertake and support various tasks, delivering to agreed performance targets, cost and schedule.

  • Developing practical skills in design techniques for land, sea and aerospace applications, understanding key processes and technologies, and developing software using state-of-the-art modelling tools, compilers and test environments

  • Working closely with Systems engineers and Hardware engineers to solve real  integration problems on complex systems.

  • Completing tasks in accordance with appropriate processes and procedures Taking an active role in engineering process improvement.

jobs.title: Senior/Principal Software Engineer - Make a Difference With Leonardo
jobs.content:
About the role


The Software Engineering function in Edinburgh have multiple opportunities for software engineers to join one of our multi-disciplinary integrated project teams (IPT) to contribute to the solving of real-life engineering problems on state-of-the-art avionics sensor systems such as: the radar for the Typhoon fighter jet; the radar for the SAAB Gripen fighter; one of our family of Surveillance AESA Radars (Active Electronically Scanned Array); an IRCM (Infra–Red Counter Measures) system; or perhaps on one of our laser target designator or laser ranging systems.


There are opportunities at all levels: Software Engineer, Senior Software Engineer and Principal Software Engineer levels depending on the skills and experience of the candidate.


Key Responsibilities



  • Software development may include the full software lifecycle from requirements analysis; through design, coding and unit test; to integrating the software with the hardware target; and lastly to acceptance test and delivery to the customer.

  • As a software engineer, you are responsible for creating high quality and robust code; for fully documenting and recording your work products; keeping them under configuration management and providing plans and reports on progress to your supervisor.

  • The functionality provided by the software is extensive and varied, such as Radar control and mode selection, target tracking, Signal Processing mode algorithms and hardware interfacing.

  • You will develop practical skills in design techniques for aerospace applications, understanding of key processes and technologies, and develop software using state-of-the-art modelling tools, compilers and test environments.

  • You will work closely with Systems engineers and Electronics engineers to solve real integration problems on a complex system.

  • Depending on your level of experience, you may be required to supervise a small team of engineers and you will then be responsible for planning and managing the work for yourself and your team; for coaching more junior team members and ensuring a robust engineering solution for the team’s work packages.

  • There may be opportunities to contribute towards the investigation and analysis of leading edge development methodologies and influence the future path of software development within Selex ES.

  • Most training will be delivered via on-the-job experience working in real software teams within project groups delivering sensor systems to our customers. Additional formal technical training to augment the on-the-job training may be provided via taught courses depending on the business needs.

jobs.title: DevOps Engineer  Microsoft Stack- Continuous Delivery - Azure SaaS PaaS
jobs.content:
We are looking for a talented DevOps engineer that is passionate about technology, loves learning new skills and want to work for a company where delivering software is the primary focus of the business rather than an ancillary service.


This is an opportunity to work for a progressive forward thinking company where the product development team is the backbone of the company. You will be working on a new and interesting project and will gain exposure to the latest technologies, whilst at the same time having some fun and working with a great bunch of people. If you are passionate about delivering great SaaS solutions and want to work somewhere where a blind insistence on suits, tidy haircuts and lumbering bureaucracy is actively shunned in favour of pragmatic focus on being effective and doing things well.


You will be operating as a DevOps engineer supporting the wider product development team and interfacing with the service delivery organisation. You will be taking a lead in defining and implementing Perfect Channels continuous delivery strategy in support of the delivery of our flagship PaaS and SaaS trading product. In addition you will be involved in providing ongoing support to our cross functional scrum development teams and oversight in relation to the improvement and ongoing maintenance of the delivery pipeline. You will also be involved in supporting and managing release of key application updates.


You will be comfortable working with a mature Agile delivery organisation and ideally will have experience working in accordance with processes based on agile frameworks such as scrum and or Kanban.


Maintaining a team centric philosophy is fundamental to the success of our delivery process so everyone is encouraged to take responsibility; we share in success when things are going well and everyone owns the problems when they are not.


We know that everyone has different strengths and ambitions and that individuals bring different contributions to the team. We want you to be able to play to your strengths, and be interested in what you do. We aim to offer career progression that aligns your interests with the interests of the business. If you love working with technology we aren't going to insist that you climb the management ladder to advance your career, we want you to be happy and we will reward you for doing what you do best. On the other hand if your future ambitions lie in leadership or elsewhere we will see how we can help with those too.


You won’t find a stuffy inflexible corporate environment or approach, we like to be more laid back and have fun while we work, however we are deadly serious about delivering quality products and doing things well. We encourage continuous improvement and our teams are empowered to change the way we do things to ensure we always employ the most effective approach possible.

jobs.title: Head of Software Development
jobs.content:
At BCSG, everything we do is about helping businesses to be more successful. For Financial Institutions and telcos, that means helping them develop better relationships with their customers through technology. And for small businesses, that means connecting them to the applications and services they need to make their business work.

Our team has been providing applications to small businesses for the past 10 years in partnership with global brands, reaching over 20 million small businesses worldwide.

We have experienced rapid growth over the last 8 years but still strongly believe in retaining all the brilliant things about being a small business. This means we have a flat structure, a fun and friendly environment and open communication channels across the organisation. We operate in a fast paced, innovative market where everyone's skills and experience are used to their full potential. The result, every employee is part of the process and is valued for their contribution towards our success.

The Role

Manage the effective delivery of all BCSG software projects. This role will require serious technical experience and, whilst it is not envisioned to be hands-on, you will need a strong background in software engineering. You will be primarily responsible for taking ownership of the technical delivery of our development programme, ensuring developers and business owners are kept in sync, effectively managing development resource across work streams.

Key Accountabilities

  • Technical leadership of BCSGs development programme
  • Line management of senior developers and software delivery managers
  • Oversight of entire development process and SCRUM teams

jobs.title: Senior Unity Developer required for HTC Vive VR project.
jobs.content:
Masters of Pie are looking for an experienced Unity developer to help us with building an ambitious, experimental, collaborative Vive (and potentially Hololens) tool for the workplace. If you are interested in building software tools that work with the very latest in VR and AR technology and may even change the way we interface with digital content in the workplace then we would love to chat with you.

Broadly speaking, your tasks would include experimenting with spatial (virtual) user interfaces, exploring collaborative work environments in VR and working with CAD based data sets.


You will need to be able to work from our London studio. No remote work or studios please. The position is available for an immediate start.

jobs.title: Java-utvecklare
jobs.content:
Etimo hjälper ledande organisationer inom primärt Finans, Spel, Media, E-handel, IT och Telekom att utveckla verksamhetskritiska IT-system. Därmed ställs höga krav, både på oss som individer och på de lösningar vi utvecklar. Ett typiskt projekt är mellan tre och nio månader långt där vi arbetar tillsammans med klienten från A till Ö för att utveckla en skräddarsydd lösning.


THE ETIMO WAY


Etimo är ett värderingsstyrt företag. Det innebär att organisationen är platt och individen har stor egen frihet att verka och fatta beslut inom de ramar som våra kärnvärden utgör. Etimos fyra kärnvärden är Kompetens, Samarbete, Affärsförståelse och Ständig förbättring.


Kompetens: Etimo är ett kompetenscentrum inom IT och utveckling. Vi har teknisk spetskompetens, djup insikt i utvecklingsprocesser och enastående förmåga att lösa problem.


Samarbete: Samarbete möjliggör kompetensdelning och bidrar till ständig förbättring. En stark grupp som arbetar tillsammans mot gemensamma mål når högre. Därför är samarbete centralt för oss. För att samarbetet skall bli effektivt krävs att varje individ tar sitt eget ansvar i gruppen. Tillsammans, genom vår samlade kompetens kombinerat med tydligt individuellt ansvar, uppnår vi fantastiska resultat.


Affärsförståelse: Endast med god förståelse för kundens kärnaffär och utmaningar kan vi leverera bestående kundvärde. Baserat på kundens affär och den specifika situationen skräddarsyr vi en lösning för att skapa förstklassigt kundvärde.


Ständig förbättring: Såväl på individ-nivå som på företags-nivå måste vi ständigt förbättras på alla områden för att möta morgondagens utmaningar. Genom en icke-hierarkisk struktur och ett prestigelöst förhållningssätt uppmuntrar vi nya innovativa idéer och förbättringsförslag från hela organisationen.

jobs.title: Create smiles by writing awesome code
jobs.content:
As a PHP Developer at Coolblue you will make sure our web shops are ridiculously fast and meticulously kept.


What you tell your friends you do
"I build web shops. And no - I will not fix your computer."


What you will really be doing



  • Coming up with new functionalities and building them.

  • Improving the technology that runs over 300 web shops.

  • Improving the user-friendliness of all of those web shops.


How will you be doing this?



  • You are an all-rounder in a Scrum team. You will have your own specialization, but you will also be able to perform all other tasks within the team.

  • You prioritize your own work together with your team and Product Owner. You will receive immediate feedback from end users and you will have a lot of opportunities to experiment.

  • You will be using the right tools for whatever job will be thrown at you. Choices that were made in the past are not rules.

  • You will work in a motivated team to meet ambitious deadlines. There is always a budget for good ideas.

  • Big data is your guru, your gut feeling isn't. To measure is to know.


What we have worked on last quarter



  • Faceted search. Search and filter real-time product information, hundreds of times per second, for 90.000 products in 280 shops.

  • Responsive design. One codebase, lots of devices, but always the optimal user experience.

  • Reviews. A completely new infrastructure for better performance and scalability. Improved usability for both customers and moderators. More reviews, more interaction, less spam, better conversion rates.


What a day in the office might look like
You open a pull request in GitHub for your last changes in the Javascript codebase of one of the back-end services for our new faceted-search functionality. You have fixed a bug in a de-serialisation method that was causing metadata to leak from JSON objects. Considering the large amount of simultaneous, relatively small requests these services process, Node.js seemed the obvious choice. So you had to abandon your usual work field of PHP and give the old Javascript another chance. Once again it proved itself a powerful language, capable of building beautiful stuff. Maybe the front-enders were right after all? Now that this has been tackled, you return to PHP. You had this idea to optimise the determination of the sorting order of the filters on the site...


Team
You will be working in a family with three to five other developers, each of them with their own specialization, ranging from PHP to Javascript. Your team will be managed by a Team Lead, a Scrum Master and a Product Owner. You and another team are part of the same family, so you’re both responsible for one specific domain of Coolblue.nl.

jobs.title: Lead Delphi Developer
jobs.content:
As a Lead Delphi Developer you will lead development on the application that is the backbone of Coolblue - Vanessa.


What you tell your friends you do


"I'm a roadie for Coolblue. I work behind the scenes to make sure everyone is able to do their work as fast as possible."


What you will really be doing



  • You will lead a team of experienced Delphi and PL/SQL developers.

  • You will build new functionalities and optimize current ones for all the processes behind the scenes of our online shops and physical stores.

  • Coupling Vanessa (back office system) and its Oracle DB with other systems, including Google Analytics,  Coolblue Business Intelligence and the rest of our microservices based back office.

  • Implementing a system for continuous delivery of Vanessa.


How you will be doing this



  • Actively coaching and continuously providing feedback to team members, you will help make them 'a little bit better every day'.

  • Selecting and interviewing candidates for your team in collaboration with our IT recruitment department and other HR related tasks.

  • Using Scrum you prioritize your own work together with your team and Product Owner. You will receive immediate feedback from end users and you will have a lot of opportunities to experiment.

  • You will be using the right tools for whatever job will be thrown at you. Choices that were made in the past are not rules.

  • Creating extremely well crafted code that is robust and maintainable, and delivers on the user's expectations. 

  • You will work in a motivated team to meet ambitious deadlines. 

  • There is always a budget for good ideas.


What we have worked on last quarter



  • Logistics.22,000 square meters of warehouse space: thousands and thousands of products in all shapes and sizes, ordered before midnight, delivered the next day.

  • Replenishment of stores.New functionality was built to improve the restocking of the physical stores.

  • Optimising callsmade by the web stores through our internal service to the Oracle DB. Increasing our ability to serve many customers concurrently.


What a day in the office might look like


Parcel sorter will be the next story of the sprint you are handling. Using this link diminishes the amount of times a package has to be picked up, checked and put away by a whopping 15,000 times. Logistics will be happy. The data model only needs minor adjustments. The service that takes care of communication is easily fixed. FTP is more demanding than a web service, but you know how it rolls. Twenty packages are stuck in line somewhere and you and another team member need to find out why. Found it: the creation of multicolli packages happens in a different way. Tuesday is release day, so then you get to see the happy faces in Logistics when they put your work to use.


Team


You'll become part of an agile, multidisciplinary team, ranging in size between four and six members. You get your own team room, a scrum master to help guide the process and a product owner to represent the business' needs.

jobs.title: Lead PHP Developer
jobs.content:
As a Lead PHP Developer at Coolblue you will support your team define the shopping experience of hundreds of thousands of people daily.


What you tell your friends you do
"I'm like Yoda. ‘Code size matters not. Judge it by it's size you should not. For my ally is The Code. And a powerful ally it is"


What you will really be doing



  • You will work with one or two cross functional teams formed by backend and frontend Developers, UX designers and a Scrum Master.

  • You will act as the technical conscience of the teams, keeping a bird eye view on the state of our codebase and initiating projects to keep it up to date and in tip-top shape.

  • You will help Product Owners in aligning the functional with the technical needs.

  • You will support team members defining their goals and the strategy to achieve them.


How will you be doing this?



  • Actively coaching and continuously providing feedback to team members, you will make them “a little bit better every day”.

  • Selecting and interviewing candidates for your teams in collaboration with our IT recruitment department and some more HR related tasks.

  • Taking part in team meetings to provide your knowledge and insights where needed.

  • Reviewing code, evangelising best practices and sustaining a culture of pragmatism as well as craftsmanship.

  • Keeping up to date with the latest in Web development, improving our tools and processes where needed.


What we have worked on last quarter



  • Responsive design. One code base, infinitely devices, but always the most optimal user experience.

  • Microservice Architecture. A complete new infrastructure for better performance and scalability.

  • Scalable Team Structure. In january 2016 we introduced a new structure in which every team belongs to one of our four families. Each family is responsible for a domain. This structure permits teams to perform in our dynamic environment. 


What a day in the office might look like
You arrive in the office in the morning, just in time for a coffee before the daily stand up with your team. You discover Marco is working on a story which is becoming more and more complex, so you help him keeping things simple and at the same time aligned better with the business case. After the stand up you sit beside Rafael who is having troubles working on a Google Analytics API client. You try to understand what is exactly the problem and with your help, Rafael come up with a new approach on how to solve the problem.


You meet a candidate over lunch. You aren’t looking at skills yet, you just want to get to know her. How would her personality match with the rest of the herd? Can she communicate ideas clearly and concisely? Can she talk fluently about the technologies Coolblue deploys? It’s your shot at filtering out candidates that don’t fit the mould. Not bad, not bad at all. She passes. For now. Of course, your senior team members will pick her apart technically later.


In the afternoon, you have a face to face sync with Rafael. You ask if the new approach for the API client is working. Then you talk about what he will be focusing on the upcoming months. He has no clear idea about that and so you ask him questions about which epic motivates him the most and which task he prefers. Rafael has a clearer idea now about his focus and he will think how to keep attention in this. 
Since you have no more meetings in the day, you propose a table tennis tournament with the whole team. The team loves that and even if you lose all of the matches, you have a great time.

Team
You'll work with one or two cross functional teams formed by backend and frontend Developers, UX designers and a Scrum Master. They have different levels of experience and you will support them towards becoming even more amazing than they already are. Your teams, together with other teams in the same family, are responsible for a particular domain of our software architecture.

jobs.title: I'm a roadie for Coolblue! Creating stability behind the scenes!
jobs.content:
As a Delphi Developer you will optimize all processes happening behind the scenes at Coolblue.


What you tell your friends you do


“I'm a roadie for Coolblue. I work behind the scenes to make sure everyone is able to do their work as fast as possible.”


What you will really be doing



  • Coming up with and building new functionalities for all the processes behind the scenes of our online shops and physical stores.

  • Optimizing routes.

  • Coupling data with systems, such as Google Analytics and Business Intelligence.

  • Implementing automatised quality control.

  • Splitting systems into services.


How will you be doing this?



  • You are an all-rounder in a Scrum team. Besides your own specialization you will learn to perform all other tasks within the team.

  • You prioritize your own work together with your team and Product Owner. You will receive immediate feedback from end users and you will have a lot of opportunities to experiment.

  • You will be using the right tools for whatever job will be thrown at you. Choices that were made in the past are not rules.

  • You will work in a motivated team to meet ambitious deadlines.

  • There is always a budget for good ideas.

  • Measurements on results and experience are your gurus, your gut feeling isn't. To measure is to know.


What we have worked on last quarter



  • Logistics. Introduced zone picking. The traditional wave picking didn't scale well when we doubled our warehouse size in 2015, so we are migrating this to zone picking. 

  •  The implementation we worked on is a hybrid between zone picking and wave picking, which is already a huge improvement. In the coming year we will keep refining this method.

  • Returns. Better streamlining of the returns process, like introducing a quick-repair wizard for service desks in stores and many other improvements.


 What a day in the office might look like


Parcel sorter will be the next story of the sprint you are handling. Using this link diminishes the amount of times a package has to be picked up, checked and put away by a whopping 3,500 times. Logistics will be happy. The data model only needs minor adjustments. The service that takes care of communication is easily fixed. FTP is more demanding than a web service, but you know how it rolls. Twenty packages are stuck in line somewhere and you and another team member need to find out why. Found it: the creation of multicolli packages happens in a different way. Tuesday is release day, so then you get to see the happy faces in Logistics when they put your work to use.


Team


You'll become part of an agile, multidisciplinary family, ranging in size between five and seven members. You get your own team room, a scrum master to help guide the process and a product owner to represent the business' needs.

jobs.title: Machine Learning Engineer
jobs.content:
As a Machine Learning Engineer you use the data of millions of visitors to enable Coolblue to act smarter.


What you tell your friends you do


"I am the fortune teller of Coolblue. After investigating and analysing different data sources, I understand the past and I predict the future.


What you will really be doing



  • Performing complex in-depth analyses by using statistical models.

  • Create new insights, design procedures and smart solutions for the future of the business.

  • Integrating analyses, data and business processes by incorporating the data solutions in our systems.

  • Collaborate with the IT Development team to ensure the correct implementation of algorithms, the creation of new features and the launch of real-time model experiments

  • Proposing improvement initiatives that enable constant improvements at Coolblue.

  • Coaching junior Data Scientists.

  • Advising your team members and colleagues.


How will you be doing this?



  • You are fully aware of the fact that you first need quality data in order to perform optimal analysis, and you know just how to obtain this from various data sources.

  • Provide technical expertise and solutions to Data technologies with a focus on Business Analytics / Business Intelligence.

  • You use this data for analyses and implement this autonomously in the many software systems that Coolblue has at its disposal.

  • Implement machine learning techniques firstly as prototype, to later on implement it in a production environment.

  • You will use the right tools for whatever job will be thrown at you.

  • You experiment with new technologies and ideas and put them to work on your own.

  • You work in multidisciplinary teams and you can easily navigate a quickly expanding organisation.


What we have worked on last quarter



  • We have implemented an online product alternatives done with PySpark. 

  • We have increased the precision and performance of our forecasting procedures by using a Stochastic Gradient Boosting method.

  • Preparing an approach for a daily price-elasticity estimation by product.

  • Internal challenge to predict the user gender using the information generated in a session. 


What a day in the office might look like


This day you’ll have the challenge to improve our weekly sales forecasting models. Of course you make a plan on how to achieve this. You would like to have more knowledge about the current situation. Therefore you need to gather the necessary data from our systems and plot it in such a way that you see the situation in terms of precision. In the afternoon you’ll have a talk with the colleagues who have worked on this problem earlier, but you would like to prepare yourself well for the meeting. You gained a nice idea from the meeting and work this out. Now you can make a prototype to improve the forecast working with only a small sample of the time series, in this case you decide to create a script written in R with your new approach. Nice! You increased the precision of the forecast by 2% in average.  It only pays off when the algorithm is implemented, so therefore you make plans how you are going to do this in the upcoming weeks..

jobs.title: Senior PHP Developer
jobs.content:
As a PHP Developer at Coolblue you will make sure our web shops are ridiculously fast and meticulously kept.


What you tell your friends you do
"I build web shops. And no - I will not fix your computer."


What you will really be doing



  • Coming up with new functionalities and building them.

  • Improving the technology that runs over 300 web shops.

  • Improving the user-friendliness of all of those web shops.


How will you be doing this?



  • You are an all-rounder in a Scrum team. You will have your own specialization, but you will also be able to perform all other tasks within the team.

  • You prioritize your own work together with your team and Product Owner. You will receive immediate feedback from end users and you will have a lot of opportunities to experiment.

  • You will be using the right tools for whatever job will be thrown at you. Choices that were made in the past are not rules.

  • You will work in a motivated team to meet ambitious deadlines. There is always a budget for good ideas.

  • Big data is your guru, your gut feeling isn't. To measure is to know.


What we have worked on last quarter



  • Faceted search. Search and filter real-time product information, hundreds of times per second, for 90.000 products in 280 shops.

  • Responsive design. One codebase, lots of devices, but always the optimal user experience.

  • Reviews. A completely new infrastructure for better performance and scalability. Improved usability for both customers and moderators. More reviews, more interaction, less spam, better conversion rates.


What a day in the office might look like
You open a pull request in GitHub for your last changes in the Javascript codebase of one of the back-end services for our new faceted-search functionality. You have fixed a bug in a de-serialisation method that was causing metadata to leak from JSON objects. Considering the large amount of simultaneous, relatively small requests these services process, Node.js seemed the obvious choice. So you had to abandon your usual work field of PHP and give the old Javascript another chance. Once again it proved itself a powerful language, capable of building beautiful stuff. Maybe the front-enders were right after all? Now that this has been tackled, you return to PHP. You had this idea to optimise the determination of the sorting order of the filters on the site...


Team
You will be working in a family with three to five other developers, each of them with their own specialization, ranging from PHP to Javascript. Your team will be managed by a Team Lead, a Scrum Master and a Product Owner. You and another team are part of the same family, so you’re both responsible for one specific domain of Coolblue.nl.

jobs.title: .NET Architect
jobs.content:
As a .Net Architect at Coolblue you think big, build small and stay ahead of the curve.


What you tell your friends you do


"I act as forward reconnaissance for our development teams. I look ahead, find potential challenges and figure out how to deal with them before they slow us down."


What you'll really be doing



  • Setting development teams up for success by helping them overcome the tricky bits before they get tricky.

  • Developing a long term vision for our systems architecture in collaboration with other Engineering Solution Leads.

  • Creating technical standards, such as design constraints and code conventions.

  • Finding different ways of accomplishing our goals, weighing the short and long term, and providing stakeholders with options.


 How you will be doing this



  • Getting hands on, coding, working with teams to help them achieve your shared goals. This role is about collaborating, not dictating – if you want an ivory tower, play chess.

  • Finding and using tools and approaches that actually work in practice, and are not just a trending topic in the blogosphere.

  • Bringing big, abstract concepts back to earth by making them simple, explainable and understood by all – technical and non-technical alike.

  • Prototyping, researching and investigating possible angles for upcoming projects.

  • Balancing off-the-shelf components, and building it ourselves.

  • You think big and build small. In the end it's about getting things done.


Our stack
Coolblue uses quite a broad technology stack and we greatly value open standards and interoperability. We actively develop in PHP, Node.js and C#, and maintain a large Delphi codebase. Our data is currently being handled by Oracle and MySQL RDBMS, Elasticsearch, Memcached, Redis and RavenDB. We apply continuous delivery through tools like GitHub, TeamCity, Octopus Deploy and Puppet, on both private and cloud infrastructure (Azure, AWS).

Team
You collaborate with other Engineering Solutions Leads and report to our Development Manager. You'll frequently work closely together with one or more development teams.

jobs.title: Developer with passion for data
jobs.content:
You will bring your functional programming skills and passion to make sense of all kinds of data to our business intelligence teams.


If your friends ask what you do, you’ll say


"If it needs doing more than once, I automate it. If the data has value, I make it useable."


What we have worked on last quarter



  • Automated a ton of ETL process and deployment pipelines

  • Lots of BigQuery

  • Sent a ton of deprecated systems to the eternal dustbin somewhere

  • Made new logistic and commercial data actionable


Your team


In a few words, we - ask why a lot, automate everything, make data actionable, are willing to help, have a great team, use everything from SQL to Puppet to Python to BigQuery, enjoy our responsibilities.

jobs.title: Continuous Integration Engineer
jobs.content:
The HERE Release Management & Engineering team, which promotes Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery (CI/CD) within the company, is looking for experienced Continuous Integration Engineer to develop and extend our CI infrastrucutre. We are providing CI as a service for developer teams within the company, and the focus on CI/CD testing.


Candidates should have around 4-5 years of professional  experience in DevOps/CI, preferably including intermediate knowledge of software development and automated testing disciplines.


You will get an opportunity to become a member of our dynamic and fast paced 40+ nationality community, develop innovative test tool approaches, and work on new technologies.


The responsibilities include:



  • Development of company´s internal CI system, providing a comprehensive API for CI/CD.



  • Contributing to the design of those services.



  • Working with development teams to provide support and solution for  automation.



  • Promoting continuous integration & continuous delivery within the company.



  • Driving innovation around CI.

jobs.title: Sr. Software Engineer
jobs.content:
We are hiring for Senior Engineer passionate for Quality for our Map Data Delivery Team in Berlin.


Do you want to work on projects with an amazing scale and develop solutions for millions of users? Keep reading!


To learn more about HERE, including our work in the areas of connected and autonomous driving, visit http://360.here.com orhttps://company.here.com/here/”


Join our fast growing, highly motivated Map Data Delivery team as an experienced Software Engineer passionate for building the map in Berlin, Germany. You will be responsible for development, test and operation of map build pipeline which creates map artifacts used by other teams and customers.


In an agile context, we offer



  • Be part of a fast-growing team that create the map that is use by millions of users daily!

  • To work with evolving and challenging technologies and be part the map of the future

  • To work F2F with real experts in the field in an international environment

  • To develop scalable, flexible and comprehensive tested solutions

  • A chance to contribute to the current and future products we are proud of.


Some of the responsibilities you will have in our team (but are not limited to):



  • Contributing to Map Test Framework by coding in Python

  • Developing and maintaining parts of Map build pipeline(using Jenkins and shell scripting)

  • Automating test workflows as much as possible

  • Proactively contacting stakeholders on dailybasis

  • Bringing our Map build pipelines to the next level

jobs.title: Senior C++ Engineer - On-Device Search
jobs.content:
We are looking for a passionate engineer with excellent C++ skills to help improve our on-device local search; the position is located in Berlin, Germany


About HERE


HERE, a Nokia company, offers the world’s freshest maps and location experiences across multiple screens and operating systems. Formerly known as NAVTEQ and Nokia Location & Commerce, we established our new unified brand in 2012. HERE inspires a new generation of location services and devices helping more people to navigate their lives with ease and confidence every day and everywhere. Built on 30 years of experience in cartography and drawing on more than 80,000 sources of data, HERE offers “Maps for Life” for 196 countries, voice guided navigation in 95 countries, live traffic information for 41 countries, and support over 50 languages. Our maps can be found in 4 out of 5 in-car navigation systems in North America and Europe. We have powered mobile and web companies for more than 10 years. Our customers include Amazon, Yahoo, Garmin, BMW, Toyota, and many more. We are very proud of being the largest and most highly-trained team of map-makers on the planet with 6,000 people in more than 56 countries. To learn more about HERE, visit http://360.here.com


About our on-device search team


Our software answers geographic searches on millions of mobile devices.Examples of search queries include street addresses, cities, landmarks and points of interest (POIs). We use locally stored map data to answer user queries, without the need for an online connection. Our challenges include answering these queries using the latest Information Retrieval (IR) techniques in resource-scarce environment. We develop efficient lookup methods and highly compressed indices based on world-class geo-data.


As a Senior C++ Engineer in our team, you will be:




  • Developing local search software for mobile and car


  • Reviewing C++ software design


  • Designing efficient data formats


  • Measuring and optimizing software performance

jobs.title: Lead Test Engineer
jobs.content:
HERE is a leader in navigation, mapping and location experiences. We combine highly accurate and fresh maps with cloud technology to enable rich, real-time location experiences in a broad range of connected devices – from smartphones and tablets to wearables and vehicles. To learn more about HERE, including our work in the areas of connected and autonomous driving, visit http://360.here.com 


The Geo Insights team of Here Enterprise is responsible for big data crunching, analytics and cool visualization on HERE maps.  We consist of enthusiastic scrum teams who work together to deploy new code to production daily. 


We are looking for a lead specialist who can help us build effective end to end quality system, plan and execute extensive product and data testing, perform test automation and embed quality into the scrum process.


In this position, as the QA team leader you will be responsible for:


Designing, building & maintaining our quality system based on processes and tests automation


Making technology/frameworks decisions in conjunction with our tech leads to ensure we are building quality into our product throughout its lifecycle



  • Organizing & building automated and manual testing for our servers, web applications, databases and APIs.

  • Organizing & building performance and load testing looking at server and client performance.

  • Supporting the product teams in maintaining a high level of test coverage so we can continue to deploy new releases continuously.

  • Maintaining the tests’ documentation and reports.

jobs.title: Principal Medical Industrial Designer
jobs.content:
Background

Headquartered in Cincinnati, Kaleidoscope is a strategic innovation and product design firm with more than 100 employees. We create products and experiences that grow businesses and improve lives by leveraging our expertise at the intersection of consumer insights, technology and health and wellness. We call this Purpose Driven Innovation.™

Our culture is collaborative, authentic and highly creative. We celebrate design excellence and learning. It is our passion to stay on top of trends and to bring them to all of our projects. In fact, Kaleidoscope was chosen as a winner for the Cincinnati Business Courier’s 2015 Best Places to Work and as a finalist in 2014. Our strong sense of mentorship for new talent and professional development creates an environment where your career will thrive.

If you’d like to join our team of designers and product developers, we’d like to talk with you!

Please note that Kaleidoscope does not provide monetary assistance with a visa of any kind.


Responsibilities

Operates as a functional expert on healthcare & medical design projects. Understands and meets the client needs (not asks) in a clear and professional manner.
Executes high quality design solutions with limited or no supervision.
Drives design excellence through well-reasoned creative product solutions and supporting aesthetic solutions. Designs a defendable design with logic and reason. .
Operates as a design and user advocate within the project teams and toward our clients.
Serves as a mentor to more junior designers on the team.

Qualifications
Knowledge and skills at a level normally acquired through the completion of a Bachelor’s degree in Industrial Design or related fields. Advanced degree preferred.
10-15 years of industry experience in medical product design, required.
Demonstrated passion towards user driven design creation.
Demonstrated ability to translate a user targeted problem statement into a logical design strategy and concept for a team to take action upon.
Exhibit a solid understanding and experience delivering results based on consumer insights.
Advanced ability to quickly synthesize inputs and drive towards appropriate solutions.
Demonstrated ability to effectively communicate design intent in a variety of methods at a high degree of professionalism.
Strong sketching and conceptualizing abilities.
Deep production design experience: understanding of materials, processes and assembly.
Deep knowledge of surface design to meet manufacturing requirements and class-A surface aesthetic quality; flawless release to client CAD system.
Strong intrapersonal skills.
Expert proficiency of latest digital tools: 2D- Adobe Suite , Sketchbook Pro, Painter, 3D- SolidWorks and Keyshot

jobs.title: Software Developer
jobs.content:
We are looking for you to join our development team. We are looking for great people, not just skills. If you got talent and passion, we’d like to meet you. Only like to do backend work? No problem, we are searching for frontend and backend developers alike!


We know you are curious, so here is our core technology stack:



  • Pyramid for our RESTful backend

  • Angular for our frontend client

  • PostgreSQL as our main data store

  • Elasticsearch for search

  • Docker and Ansible for deployment and development


If you are not familiar with any of these, this job will be your chance to learn about them. Don't like the stack? Join us and tell us why. We listen!

jobs.title: productlijnmanager technisch applicatiebeheer
jobs.content:
productlijnmanager technisch applicatiebeheer

Binnen de ICT-dienst van de politie zijn grote hervormingen ingezet. Er zijn 14 product- en servicelijnen ingericht. We staan voor de uitdaging om deze productlijnen te vormen, in stelling te brengen en te organiseren. Hiervoor zoeken we ervaren productlijnmanagers die met visie aansluiting realiseren bij de behoefte van de business en de primaire processen van de politieorganisatie.

Het team technisch applicatiebeheer stelt en houdt de applicatie specifieke infrastructuur van de politie beschikbaar. Het gaat hierbij om de applicaties zelf plus de ICT-componenten die specifiek voor een applicatie nodig zijn, zoals databases en middleware producten. Hierbij wordt gewerkt onder centraal vastgestelde architectuur en vanuit een standaard productportfolio.

Het team bestaat uit vier productlijnen: Common-Of-The-Shelf, Generiek, Informatie en Transactie. Binnen elke productlijn wordt een logisch cluster van applicaties beheerd conform leveringsafspraken. Ook wordt in elke productlijn de lifecycle van applicaties gemanaged en gewerkt aan de (door)ontwikkeling , in nauwe samenwerking met de leverancier en/of de ontwikkelingssector.

Functie
Als productlijnmanager ben je primair aanspreekpunt voor de servicelijnen over de instandhouding, ontwikkeling en vernieuwing van producten die binnen de productlijn vallen. Je bent verantwoordelijk voor de performance van de productlijn conform gemaakte afspraken met de servicelijnen.

Je stuurt delivery managers en lead engineers aan om een effectieve en (kosten)efficiënte dienstverlening te kunnen leveren. In de sturing weet je de balans te vinden tussen de belangen van de servicelijnen aan de ene kant en de productlijn aan de andere kant. Je initieert beleid, koers en strategie om ontwikkelingen binnen de productlijn vorm te geven vanuit technologie en business perspectief;

Verdere taken:



  • borgen van de kwaliteit en performance van de producten;

  • lifecycle management van de producten binnen de productlijn en afstemming met leveranciers op tactisch niveau;

  • promoten van de productlijn, zowel in- als extern;

  • samenwerking organiseren en afstemming zoeken met andere productlijnen/teams;

  • in projecten optreden in de rol van senior user of senior supplier;

  • opstellen van productplannen en roadmaps inclusief financiële onderbouwing;

  • zorgen voor de financiële verantwoording ten aanzien van de geleverde producten.



De functie brengt met zich mee dat je voorkomende gevallen participeert in consignatiedienst;

Join our team and experience Workday!


It's fun to work in a company where people truly believe in what they're doing. At Workday, we're committed to bringing passion and customer focus to the business of enterprise applications. We work hard, and we're serious about what we do. But we like to have a good time, too. In fact, we run our company with that principle in mind every day: One of our core values is fun.

jobs.title: QA-ENGINEER SECURITY
jobs.content:
Gestalte mit der E-POST die digitale Zukunft der Deutschen Post. Die Deutsche Post E-POST Development GmbH ist ein innovatives Internet-Unternehmen in der Oberbaum City Berlin, das an DevOps glaubt, Agilität lebt, kurze Kommunikationswege hat und Tag für Tag daran arbeitet, noch besser zu werden. Wir sind eine Tochtergesellschaft des Unternehmensbereiches Post - eCommerce - Parcel (PeP) von Deutsche Post DHL Group – der Post für Deutschland, dem Paketdienstleister für Europa und weltweitem Logistikdienstleister für den Online-Handel.


Deine Kernaufgaben


Du arbeitest in einem Information-Security Team und sorgst mit dafür, dass IT-SECURITY bei der E-POST weiterhin groß geschrieben wird. Zu Deinen Aufgaben gehört die Überprüfung der Einhaltung von Sicherheitsanforderungen, Sichtung und Bewertung von Advisories, die Administration der Web-Application-Firewall, die Definition und Implementierung von Prozessen zur Erhöhung des Sicherheitsniveaus von Anwendungen und Systemen sowie die Mitarbeit an Sicherheits­architekturen und Konzepten.


Deine Fähigkeiten und Erfahrungen



  • Mehrjährige praktische Erfahrungen in Bereichen der IT-Security, besonders unter Linux; Kenntnisse von SELinux sind von Vorteil

  • Kenntnisse in den Bereichen des OWASP

  • Sehr gute Kenntnisse in den Bereichen Linux, SQL-Datenbanken, Middleware, Netzwerktechnologien und Kryptographie

  • Erfahrungen in der Anwendung von IT-Sicherheitstools, wie z.B. Burp, Nessus, Nmap, Wireshark etc.

  • Starke Ziel- und Ergebnisorientierung sowie Flexibilität und Kreativität verbunden mit erfahrungsbasiertem Pragmatismus

  • Deine Deutschkenntnisse entsprechen mindestens dem B2-Level


Dein Kontakt


Rita Heise-Ruppert, Telefon: +49 228 182 669 03

jobs.title: Développeur ASP.NET MVC
jobs.content:
Imaginer, avec l'aide des médecins, les applications de télémédecine de demain, ça vous tente ?


Sous la supervision du directeur technique, vous intégrez une équipe jeune et dynamique avec les missions suivantes :

jobs.title: Senor Node JavaScript Developer Job
jobs.content:
Senor Node JavaScript Developer - London - Immediate start - £350 - £400pd


Your new company is a innovative provider of document-centric automation solutions. Currently the most powerful document automation offering on the market for financial, legal and commercial applications.

Your new role will require you to be an experienced senior-level JavaScript developer. You will have proven experience of building high-performance, scalable, enterprise-grade applications at a commercial level.

The ideal candidate will have experience implementing enterprise authentication systems using Oauth/SAML/SSO/Active Directory, required to integrate an existing NodeJS SSO OAuth 2 Identity Service with client SSO systems. You will have 5 years+ hands-on coding experience with JavaScript and NodeJS and Client-facing technical documentation experience.

You will also have knowledge of:
  • - Sequelize ORM
  • - Linux (CentOS)
  • - ExpressJS
  • - PassportJS
  • - Jira

jobs.title: iOS developer
jobs.content:
Football Addicts is looking for iOS developers with strong experience in Objective-C to join our team in Gothenburg, Sweden.

You will be working on our iOS apps - from Forza Football, that keeps our users up-to-date on their favourite teams and competitions to video highlight systems and new, groundbreaking systems.

Forza Football has over 10 million installs and over 2 million monthly active users, and at peak hours it handles thousands requests per second and sends millions of push notifications.

We are a small team of developers and designers dedicated to building great mobile apps for football fans all over the world.

Football Addicts is bootstrapped and profitable, which means no interference from investors - we have full control over our company and products, and we only build things we are proud of. We keep things simple, we have no middle managers and we avoid lengthy company policies and bureaucracy.

Our office is located in central Gothenburg, Sweden. We offer free breakfasts and Friday beers, ping-pong and shuffleboard and all the tools you need to do great work.


Benefits


  • Your choice of computer setup
  • Flexible work hours
  • Five weeks paid vacation, unlimited time off
  • No middle managers and unnecessary bureaucracy
  • Breakfast every day
  • Friday beers
  • Conference visits with all expenses paid
  • Ping-pong and shuffleboard
  • Read about how we created our new office: http://blog.footballaddicts.com/bestoffice
  • Become a shareholder
  • Relocation support
  • Visa sponsorship
  • Come as you are, we strongly believe in a diverse workplace
  • We have a great relationship with Apple and get invited to events and workshops often

jobs.title: Senior JavaScript Engineer
jobs.content:
The Geo Insights team of Here Enterprise is responsible for big data crunching, analytics and cool visualization on HERE maps.


What will you do?


As part of the Enterprise team you will contribute by creating tools that allow platform partners, for instance media companies, to efficiently utilize HERE Maps on their services, shaping new ways of communication.


We are looking for an experienced professional with knowledge of the latest web technologies, with first class mastering of CSS and JavaScript. You love iterating on a piece of UI until it works just right. You've worked closely with designers to not only build user interfaces, but provide ideas and experiment with what's possible. You like to work hard to help people get as much done as quickly as possible. You're not precious about dropping into new technologies to see how things work. You are open-minded, flexible, down with dynamic and fast paced working environment, excited about fixing problems, and you're a team player.


As our JavaScript specialist, you will develop major frontend parts of our Geo Insights platform. In this position you will not just move some pixel, but develop the low-level JavaScript basis of our solution. Therefore, we are searching for a real Engineer that is able to do some heavy lifting without frameworks and is not afraid of some mathematic challenges. If you have passion for Maps and want to play a major role in developing a truly innovative, highly complex, large scale big data solution, we surely want to hear from you!  


What will you do?



  • Build a fast, reliable, scalable and fully customizable “consumer-grade” visualization platform based on Geo Data

  • Develop all the libraries needed for that

  • Build the JavaScript API used by 3rd party developers

  • Share your knowledge within a democratic team of experts, to achieve optimal solutions

jobs.title: SharePoint Developer voor SharePoint 2013, 2016 en Office 365 projecten gezocht
jobs.content:
Werk met ons mee aan complexe SharePoint vraagstukken voor onze klanten. Wil jij jezelf blijven ontwikkelen en deel je graag jouw kennis met collega’s? Dan wil ons SharePoint team samenwerken met een collega zoals jij!



Jouw rol als SharePoint Developer



Als SharePoint Developer zet jij jouw kennis van SharePoint en het Microsoft .NET platform proactief in door te werken aan verschillende uitdagende projecten voor onze opdrachtgevers. Het niveau van de werkzaamheden is hoog. Je werkt voornamelijk aan implementaties van portals, intranetten en maatwerk SharePoint applicaties en realiseert zelfstandig nieuwe webparts, custom workflows en andere maatwerk .NET componenten. Daarbij ga je geen enkele uitdaging uit de weg.


Wie worden jouw collega’s?



Natuurlijk, jouw passie voor SharePoint draagt voor een groot deel bij aan je werkplezier als SharePoint Developer. Maar wij vinden een gezellige en inspirerende groep collega’s ook belangrijk. Jij komt terecht in een team van SharePoint specialisten en werkt nauw samen met onze Microsoft Certified Masters. Samenwerken en kennis delen staan binnen het team centraal. Tijdens maandelijkse meetings worden nieuwe technologieën en werkwijzen besproken. Daarnaast organiseert het team regelmatig workshops waarin ze samen met collega’s specifieke onderwerpen bestuderen en in de praktijk toepassen. En die kennisdeling beperkt zich niet alleen tot jullie groep. .NET collega’s en specialisten op het gebied van Windows Infrastructuur en SQL Server Platform komen vaak bij jullie over de vloer.

jobs.title: Java Developer met AngularJS ervaring gezocht
jobs.content:
Werk met ons mee aan uitdagende Java technologieën en projecten voor onze klanten. We zijn op zoek naar Java Developers die alles uit zichzelf willen halen. Die voorop willen lopen binnen het vakgebied en een tomeloze inzet hebben. Herken jij jezelf hierin? Dan wil ons Java team graag samenwerken met een collega zoals jij!



Jouw rol als Java Developer


Als Java Developer bij VX Company werk je mee aan enterprise, mobile en cloud gerelateerde projecten voor diverse en interessante opdrachtgevers. Je bent verantwoordelijk voor de ontwikkeling van functionaliteit in alle lagen van applicaties en werkt met de modernste technieken, ontwikkeltools en methoden. Het niveau van de werkzaamheden is hoog. Jouw kennis en enthousiasme wordt gevraagd in het ontwerpen en bouwen van moderne en stevige webbased enterprise applicaties volgens een Agile werkwijze.


Wie worden jouw collega’s?


Natuurlijk, jouw passie voor Java draagt voor een groot deel bij aan je werkplezier als Java Developer. Maar wij vinden een gezellige en inspirerende groep collega’s ook belangrijk. Jij komt terecht in een hecht team van 25 Java specialisten. Samenwerken en kennis delen staan binnen het team centraal. Tijdens maandelijkse meetings worden frameworks, nieuwe technologieën en werkwijzen besproken. Daarnaast komt het team minimaal één keer in het jaar een weekend samen om te coden en samen in de 'glazen bol' te kijken. En die kennisdeling beperkt zich niet alleen tot jullie groep. Specialisten op het gebied van DevOps, Mobile en Agile komen vaak bij jullie over de vloer.

Wie worden jouw collega’s?


Natuurlijk, jouw passie voor .NET draagt voor een groot deel bij aan je werkplezier als .NET Developer. Maar wij vinden een gezellige en inspirerende groep collega’s ook belangrijk. jobs.title: Accounts Payable Manager
jobs.content:
Duties and Responsibilities

  • Manages AP. Includes, Vendor Relations, and the AP disbursement group which handles all check disbursements.
  • Manages accounting functions including maintenance of general ledger, accounts payable, accounts receivable, and project accounting; ensures accuracy and timeliness.
  • Develops implements and maintains systems, procedures and policies, including accounts payable functions to ensure adherence to company guidelines.
  • Manages monthly closing of financial records and posting of month end information; ensures accuracy of financial statements.
  • Enters status change information into project accounting software to ensure employee information is accurate and up to date.
  • Provides accounting assistance to project managers and operations staff; responds to financial questions/concerns to meet business needs.
  • Acts as a liaison between the company, government and external accountants to meet information needs and to ensure that proper information is maintained for historical purposes.
  • Selects and hires employees for the groups mentioned above. Trains and evaluates employees to enhance their performance, development, and work product. Addresses performance issues and makes recommendations for personnel actions. Motivates and rewards employees including providing salary increases, bonuses and promotions within allocated budgets and company guidelines.
  • Prepares and recommends operating and personnel budgets for approval. Monitors spending for adherence to budget, recommends variances as necessary.

Basic Qualifications

  • Bachelor's degree or equivalent combination of education and experience
  • Bachelor's degree in business administration, accounting, finance, or related field preferred
  • Seven or more years of accounting experience
  • One or more years of leadership experience included
  • Experience working with generally accepted accounting principles and accounting software
  • Strong personal computer and business solutions software skills
  • Strong interpersonal skills for interacting accountants, clients, and upper management
  • Good communication skills for communicating with support personnel and management
  • Strong analytical and problem solving skills
  • Good presentation skills for educating internal clients on accounting principles
  • Good planning and organizational skills to balance and prioritize work

jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer Scala
jobs.content:
Join the financial revolution!


Are you passionate about technology and want to make a real change? Join Kreditech and our team of over 300 professionals and become part of a transforming industry. From engineering, to design, to analytics, and collections, we do things differently and we reward great ideas, team work and persistence. We have a lot of work to do – and we want you to join us!


Your Role



  • You will work on one of our core products. It allows third-party services like e-commerce platforms to integrate with our lending engine, thus provide to their customers a new way to finance their purchase - 100% online and instantly fast.

  • You will be empowered to design and implement major new features for developers and operators.

  • You will work closely with other departments, such as Product, Marketing and Data Science.

  • You will effectively estimate time to implement designs.

  • You will write and test code that survives at internet scale.

  • You will work hard to consistently make systems simpler.

jobs.content:
Join the financial revolution!


Are you passionate about Technology and want to make a real change? Join Kreditech and our team of over 300 professionals and become part of a transforming industry. From engineering, to design, to analytics, and collections, we do things differently and we reward great ideas, team work and persistence. We have a lot of work to do – and we want you to join us!

We are a technical team with strong backgrounds in both software engineering and software security. We design, implement and maintain critical security services. We work closely with other teams to improve the security as well as other strategic areas such as stability, performance and maintainability.

  • You will pioneer implementation and integration of new security tools and technologies inside the company.

  • You will effectively estimate time to implement designs.

  • You will write and test code that survives at internet scale.
